tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  HILARIOUS  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: Nice professor. Lots of assignments, but I guess it is part of the class. The class topics are boring and stupid but she tries really hard to make it more entertaining. If you handle to manage your time and do all the assignments, it should be an easy A

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Very disorganized, talked about personal life constantly. Didn\'t update grades on Blackboard

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: All around, ok teacher. Can be somewhat unorganized at times. Lectures seemed to go off topic often but she seems able to control the class. Excellent speaking clarity. Work load seemed average for an English class. Keep in mind, writing assignments generally take longer than other assignments. Show progress & do your best and you\'ll receive 4.00

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: very unprofessional, always talked about social life, not very clear on a lot of assignments, never used book, online papers were never sent back with grades, still has never responded to emails.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Teacher is young and fun! She wants you to take responsibility for your own work but is willing to help when you ask for it. 4 papers to write in english 101. Our class is one she will never forget!

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I had this teacher for English 102 and it was terrible. English has always been my favorite subject, and she made me never want to take English again. Wasn\'t helpful and a little strange....

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I love her teaching style and the way she communicates with us in class. She is still young and remembers how younger people think.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I love her teaching style and the way she communicateswith us in class. She is still young and remembers how younger people think.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: She was not organized or prepared for class. Required papers to be submitted online but never knew what grade you received on them unless you handed them to her in class. Phone calls or emails were never returned. Lecturing about her social life and personal likes and dislikes seemed to be her focus for class discussion.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I had Rachel for English 102 and she is the best English teacher i know being so young and all. she broke everything down in a way i could understand it. I would highly recommend anyone to take her class. no homework, no test....

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: She is good and know\'s she stuff

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: she fidgeted too much it was distracting. She assigned too much homework for the course of one week. You have to do a outline, rough draft, peer review and final draft for all 4 papers. I myself don\'t prewrite and still get good grades. plus reading. she is very strict on attendance and will not excuse ANY absense no matter what.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Great teacher. Knows what she is teaching.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Rachel who likes to be called by her first name was the best professor I ever had. If you need English 101 I highly recommend her. She is very helpful and laid back, not anal like most teachers I\'ve had. You might not want to purchase the handbook being that we only used it a few times. If you apply yourself to this class you will get an easy A.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Mrs. Root is new to teaching, so I didn\'t expect her to perform an excellent class. Thing is, she did just fine. The papers were simple, grading is easy, the class is understandable, best of all, shes cute!
